auspicious_timings: Marriage: All day; Housewarming: 5:00 PM – 6:00 PM; Vehicle Purchase: 12:00 PM – 1:00 PM; Business Start: 10:00 AM – 11:00 AM
day_significance: Today is Dwadashi Tithi, important for fasting and worship. Shravana Nakshatra is good for learning and knowledge. Worship of Lord Vishnu is recommended today.
